    Standard

Function reference

ColorTK

Color Mutation

Brighten
Fixe saturation at 100% and light at 50%.
Colorize
Fixe saturation at 100%.
Darken
Fixe light at 25%.
MutateColorParameter
Modify a color
Pastelize
Fixe light at 75%.
Tarnished
Fixe saturation at 25%.

Format Convertion

Col2Hex
Convert a color in hexadecimal format.
Col2Hsl
Convert a color in HSL format.
Col2Rgb
Convert a color in to RGB format.
ConvertColorFormat
Convert a color format.
GetColorFormat
Get format of a color
Hex2Hsl
Convert a color in hexadecimal to HSL.
Hex2Rgb
Convert a color in hexadecimal to RGB.
Hsl2Hex
Convert a color in HSL to hexadecimal.
Hsl2Rgb
Convert a color in HSL to RGB.
Rgb2Hex
Convert a color in RGB to hexadecimal format.
Rgb2Hsl
Convert a color in RGB to HSL format.

Format Check

IsCol
Check if a color is in R color format.
IsHex
Check if a color is in hexadecimal color format.
IsHsl
Check if a color is in HSL color format.
IsRgb
Check if a color is in RGB color format.

Palette

ggPalette
Plot a color palette.
Hue
Create an Hue palette.
Blues
Create a Blues palette
BrBG
Create a BrBG palette
BuGn
Create a BuGn palette
BuPu
Create a BuPu palette
GnBu
Create a GnBu palette
Greens
Create a Greens palette
Greys
Create a Greys palette
OrRd
Create a OrRd palette
Oranges
Create a Oranges palette
PiYg
Create a PiYg palette
PrGn
Create a PrGn palette
PuBu
Create a PuBu palette
PuBuGn
Create a PuBuGn palette
PuOr
Create a PuOr palette
PuRd
Create a PuRd palette
Purples
Create a Purples palette
RdBu
Create a RdBu palette
RdGy
Create a RdBu palette
RdPu
Create a RdPu palette
RdYlBu
Create a RdYlBu palette
RdYlGn
Create a RdYlGn palette
Reds
Create a Reds palette
Spectral
Create a Spectral palette
YlGn
Create a YlGn palette
YlGnBu
Create a YlGnBu palette
YlOrBr
Create a YlOrBr palette
YlOrRd
Create a YlOrRd palette
cividis
Create a cividis palette
inferno
Create a inferno palette
magma
Create a magma palette
mako
Create a mako palette
plasma
Create a plasma palette
rocket
Create a rocket palette
turbo
Create a turbo palette
viridis
Create a viridis palette

DataTK

Matrix

MeltSpm
Coerce matrix in tibble.
PadMtx
Add a value around a matrix.
ResizeMatrix
Resize a matrix
Rise0
Explicit zeros in sparse matrix.

Rle

ReduceRun
Apply a function over two RLE

List

TransposeList
Turns a nested list "inside-out".

Data.frame

BindFillRows
Bind data frames after filling missing columns.

Other

WrapFunction
Wrap a string into a function.

DevTK

Files

CheckFilePath
Check if a file path is valid.
GetFileExtension
Get file extension
GetFileName
Get file name.
IsPath
Check if a character string is a file path.

Verbosity

GetHelper
Create pseudo documentation.
ShowLoading
Show the loading of a looping operation.

Other

AddAttr
Add list as attributes.
NotIn
Binary operator, inverse to %in%.
Versioning
Create a version number.

StatTK

Scaling

MeanScale
Scale values by mean.
MinMaxScale
Scales values on min-max range.
RobustScalarScale
Robust scalar sclaing.
UnitLengthScale
Unit length scaling.

Normalization

CbrtNorm
Cubic root normalization.
Log2Norm
Log2 normalization.
Normalize
Normalize data.
SqrtNorm
Square root normalization.

Outliers

IqrThreshold
Find threshold for outliers triming based on inter quartile range.
QtlThreshold
Find threshold for outliers triming based on quantiles.
SdThreshold
Find threshold for outliers triming based on standard deviation.
TrimOutliers
Remove outliers.

Gaussian

Gauss
Gaussian formula.
GaussBox
One dimension Gaussian kernel.
GaussKernel
Two dimension Gaussian kernel.

Other

BoxBlur
Blur a matrix.
BreakVector
Cut a vector.
FindElbow
Find the elbow point on a curve.
InterpolateNA
Interpolate NA values in a vector.
MedianSkewness
Pearson median skewness.
Plus
Sum by removing NA.
